title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1627-3.3 - Admission preference within classifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1627-3.3 - Admission preference within classifications

State Regulations

Within the veteran and nonveteran listings of each
eligible classification, preference shall be granted in the following order, except that whenever possible, as between families equally in need of housing
and equally entitled to preference, first preference shall be given to families
with lower income: (a) families
without housing or under court order to vacate; (b) families with health
conditions; (c) families residing
in substandard housing; and
(d) families paying excessive rent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1627-3.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
